## Burrito Bowls

<span class="mh">Servings:</span> 4 servings
<br>

<span class="mh">Ingredients:</span>  
<div class="my2cols">
<ul>
  <li>Refried beans (see side dishes)</li>
  <li>Mexican Rice (see side dishes)</li>
  <li>2 veggies diced: chard/broccoli is my favorite</li> 
  <li>bell pepper, diced</li> 
  <li>Onion, diced</li>
  <li>2-3 cloves garlic, minced</li>
  <li>avacado, sour cream, hot sauce are optional toppings</li> 
</ul>
</div>
<br>
<span class="mh">Directions:</span> 
<div class="my2cols">
<ol>
  <li>Make pinto beans and mexican rice</li>
  <li>Heat oil in pan</li>
  <li>add onions and stir for a few minutes then add garlic</li>
  <li>Add bell pepper and veggies (order depends on which veggies you buy) </li>
  <li>Mix all together</li>
</ol>
</div>

<span class="mh">Time:</span>: 1 hour
